name: OBS (YUME Interactive)
description:
A small passion project I really want to make for HTML5. I always loved making games that revolve around RNG, as it requires a blessing from the algorithm to make it work. Hopefully it'll grow to have some sort of skill required to excel in it, but the RNG aspect will be its focal point.

Saves are currently local at the moment and will be stored in your browser's cache.

Will introduce a gacha system to implement battles with sometime in the future.
